projects.title: Dog vs Cat Image Classification
projects.description: Deep learning image classification model using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) to distinguish between dogs and cats. Built with TensorFlow/Keras, achieving high accuracy through transfer learning and data augmentation techniques. Trained on thousands of labeled images to create a robust binary classifier.

projects.title: Titanic Survival Prediction
projects.description: Machine learning classification model predicting passenger survival on the Titanic using various ML algorithms including Random Forest, Logistic Regression, and Decision Trees. Features comprehensive data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model comparison to achieve optimal prediction accuracy.

projects.title: Salary and Job Prediction ML
projects.description: Advanced machine learning model for predicting salary ranges and job positions based on skills, experience, and education. Implements regression and classification algorithms with feature importance analysis. Helps job seekers understand market trends and expected compensation.

projects.title: Weather Prediction System
projects.description: Machine learning-based weather forecasting system using historical weather data and time series analysis. Implements LSTM neural networks and regression models to predict temperature, humidity, and precipitation. Features data visualization with interactive charts and real-time predictions.

projects.title: Diwali Sales Data Analysis
projects.description: Comprehensive data analysis project examining Diwali festival sales patterns using Python. Leverages Pandas for data manipulation, NumPy for numerical analysis, and Matplotlib/Seaborn for visualization. Provides insights into customer behavior, popular products, and revenue trends during the festive season.

projects.title: Web Scraping Tool
projects.description: Automated web scraping application built with Python using BeautifulSoup and Selenium. Extracts structured data from websites, handles dynamic content, and stores information in databases. Features error handling, rate limiting, and data cleaning pipelines for reliable data extraction.

projects.title: AI Chatbot Assistant
projects.description: Intelligent conversational AI chatbot built with Python and natural language processing. Implements intent recognition, context management, and personalized responses. Uses machine learning models for understanding user queries and providing relevant answers across multiple domains.

projects.title: Banking Management System
projects.description: Full-featured banking management system developed in Python with SQLite database. Implements account creation, transactions, balance inquiries, and transaction history. Features secure authentication, data validation, and comprehensive error handling for reliable banking operations.

projects.title: School Result Management System
projects.description: Student result management application built with Python for educational institutions. Manages student records, grades, attendance, and generates report cards. Features data persistence with SQLite, user authentication, and automated grade calculation with performance analytics.

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.description: Python utility application for generating customizable QR codes. Supports various data types including URLs, text, contact information, and WiFi credentials. Features customization options for size, color, and error correction levels. Built with qrcode library and PIL for image processing.

projects.title: To-Do List Application
projects.description: Task management application built with Python featuring add, edit, delete, and mark complete functionality. Implements data persistence with JSON/SQLite storage, priority levels, due dates, and category organization. Clean user interface for efficient task tracking and productivity.

projects.title: Sudoku Solver Algorithm
projects.description: Intelligent Sudoku puzzle solver implementing backtracking algorithm in Python. Solves puzzles of varying difficulty levels using constraint satisfaction and recursive techniques. Features puzzle validation, step-by-step solution visualization, and performance optimization for fast solving.

projects.title: WhatsApp Automation Bot
projects.description: Automated WhatsApp messaging bot built with Python and Selenium. Schedules messages, sends bulk messages, and automates repetitive communication tasks. Features contact management, message templates, and scheduling capabilities for efficient communication automation.

projects.title: n8n Workflow Automation
projects.description: Advanced workflow automation project using n8n platform. Creates automated workflows connecting multiple services and APIs. Implements data transformation, conditional logic, and scheduled tasks for business process automation and integration between different platforms.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python Flask backend. Features dynamic project loading, contact form with database integration, resume download tracking, and beautiful UI with smooth animations. Implements RESTful API and SQLite database for data management.

projects.title: Pygame Game Development
projects.description: Interactive game developed using Python's Pygame library. Features sprite animation, collision detection, score tracking, and sound effects. Demonstrates object-oriented programming principles and game development fundamentals with smooth gameplay and engaging mechanics.

projects.title: Akinator Game Clone
projects.description: Python implementation of the popular Akinator guessing game using decision tree algorithm and machine learning concepts. Features intelligent question selection, character database, and learning capability. Demonstrates AI logic and interactive gameplay with high accuracy predictions.

projects.title: Smart Agriculture IoT System
projects.description: IoT-based smart agriculture monitoring system using Arduino and sensors. Monitors soil moisture, temperature, humidity, and automates irrigation. Features real-time data collection, remote monitoring capabilities, and automated decision-making for optimal crop management and water conservation.

projects.title: Breast Cancer Detection AI
projects.description: Advanced machine learning model for breast cancer detection using medical imaging and diagnostic data. Implements deep learning algorithms to classify tumors as benign or malignant with high accuracy. Features comprehensive data preprocessing, feature extraction from Wisconsin Breast Cancer Dataset, and multiple ML algorithms including SVM, Random Forest, and Neural Networks for early cancer detection and diagnosis support.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction System
projects.description: Intelligent heart disease prediction system using machine learning to assess cardiovascular risk. Analyzes patient health metrics including blood pressure, cholesterol levels, ECG results, and lifestyle factors to predict heart disease probability. Implements ensemble learning methods combining Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, and Random Forest for accurate cardiac risk assessment and early intervention support.
